name: Syphoné and the magic of the elements
name_original: Syphoné and the magic of the elements
description:
Syphoné and the magic of the elements is a prototype for a platformer that we made during the pixel art game jam 2022. It is made by a team of beginners that just wanted to have some fun. The prototype is made with unity and mainly using asprite.

Controls:
Keyboard/ Controller

WASD / directional pad - Movement 

Space/ A - Jump

Q / B  - Fireball

Shift/  X - Dash


We hope you enjoy it!
